entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • URI redirect doesn't match the WebAuthenticatorCallbackActivity pattern but should #29089
  • MAUI iOS Build stuck in _XamarinBuildDownloadCore Task #29087
  • SwipeView Closes when Content Changes even with SwipeBehaviorOnInvoked="RemainOpen" (iOS only) #29086
  • [MacCatalyst] DisplayActionSheet is spreading horizontal #29085

PullRequests

Created

  • [iOS] SwipeView Closes when Content Changes - fix #29088
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-swipeview

Updated

  • [iOS] Fixed KeepLastItemInView for CV1 and added support for KeepLastItemInView for CV2 #28720
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, collectionview-cv2, .NET 9 SR7
  • Implement layout system performance metrics #29074
    community ✨
  • [Android] MediaPicker: Use New Photo Picker #24027
    area-essentials, community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview4
